GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an article that has the corresponding article id that was passed
GET /api/articles/:article_id.params: It takes any number. If the number is not the id number of an article it responds with a error 404

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: responds with an array of comments for the article with the passed id
GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.params: It takes any number. If the number is not the id number of an article it responds with a error 404
